article: Everybody wants to be healthy . You know food is very important . There is much healthy food . You can have more bananas , apples , oranges and tomatoes because fruit and vegetables are good for you . But do n ' t eat too much chocolate . It ' s not healthy food . Healthy food can make you grow and make you strong and happy . Remember there is a saying , " An apple a day keeps a doctor away . " Sports can also keep you healthy . Get up early and do some sports every day . Don ' t be lazy ! You will be healthy and happy .
questions: . Which of these following sentences is true ?

model: healthy food is good for your .
healthy food can make you grow .
you can have more bananas , apples , oranges and tomatoes .
human: We do n ' t want to be healthy .
There is n ' t much healthy food .
